name: Gravity Fall (FlameShape)
description:
DASH and DODGE as fast as you can! Gravity Fall is a simple, entertaining and addictive endless runner, available for mobile and tablet devices.  Have fun playing it!

FEATURES:

  • Runs on almost all android devices
  • Extremely low battery usage
  • No ads, and no permissions required
  • Simple and elegant looking
  • Features some great electronic music
